name: Hiringplug
description: Hiringplug™ is an award-winning AI marketplace connecting employers with specialist recruiters. Their "RaaS" platform streamlines hiring with features like matching, parsing, ATS, and scheduling. Hire top talent faster across sectors, functions, and levels.
Headline: Curated Marketplace of Recruitment Agencies

Highlights.name: RaaSTM Marketplace
Highlights.description: Gain complete visibility on the performance of agencies to make data-driven decisions.

Highlights.name: Single window
Highlights.description: Engage instantly and cut down on your administrative efforts of vendor onboarding.

Highlights.name: Replacement Guarantee
Highlights.description: With up to 90 days of replacement guarantee against any early attrition, your risks are covered.

enhanced_description: Hiringplug™ is an award-winning AI marketplace that connects employers with specialist recruiters through its 'Recruitment as a Service' (RaaS™) platform. It streamlines the hiring process with core features such as AI-powered candidate matching, resume parsing, an integrated Applicant Tracking System (ATS), and scheduling capabilities. The platform serves as a single window for engaging with and onboarding recruitment vendors, significantly reducing administrative efforts. It also provides complete visibility into the performance of recruitment agencies, enabling data-driven decision-making. To mitigate risks for employers, Hiringplug offers a replacement guarantee for up to 90 days against early attrition. The service is designed to help organizations of all sizes hire top talent faster across diverse sectors, functions, and levels, aiming to fill open positions more quickly.
key_use_cases: Connecting employers with specialist recruitment agencies
Automating candidate matching and resume parsing
Managing applicant tracking and candidate progression
Reducing administrative overhead in managing recruitment vendors
Monitoring and evaluating recruitment agency performance
Mitigating risks associated with early candidate attrition
competitive_advantages: Integrated suite of hiring tools (matching, parsing, ATS, scheduling)
Centralized 'single window' for recruitment vendor engagement and management
Risk mitigation through a replacement guarantee for up to 90 days
roi_benefits: Reduced administrative effort and operational costs
Increased productivity for HR and talent acquisition teams
Mitigated financial risks associated with early candidate churn
Improved data-driven decision-making regarding recruitment agencies
Streamlined and hassle-free payment processes for recruitment services
scalability_features: Designed to support small, large, and global enterprise organizations
